game.name: Barbies Sexy Bikini Beach
game.description:
Barbie has planned out to go on the most awaited summer vacation! Without waiting for someone else, she has arrived at an exotic island where the ocean looks as blue as the wonderful sky. Your favorite doll has taken a trip all by herself and she has forgot to pick up a suitable swimsuit and, for this purpose, she needs your helping hands. Do you join the lady during this time? Give online Barbies Sexy Bikini Beach game a try to guide her to pick up the nice outfits!

Her sexy bikini body is a result of the hard efforts she made during the winter months. She has taken a chance now to show off her toned figure while enjoying the vacation on the beach. Check out all the category options to allow the girl put on the awesome beach wear in this brand new dressing game for girls! Choose a nice and sexy bikini or give her a one piece and match her dress with a matching hat and other needful stuff. Give her a nice jewelry or a suitable handbag in her hand!

A long hairstyle suits her look the most. You would also have the option to give your doll a lovely makeup and give her a complete beach look. Click the last option to change the background and prepare it for a wonderful place for the vacation! We have countless html5 princess dress up games for kids to play online, no download required. Try out the ones that you find pretty interesting and help to polish your fashion skills! Enjoy some more popular free doll games on atmegame.com!
